name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
QA Engineer with over 13 years of experience in Quality Assurance methodologies, specializing in API testing, functional testing, regression testing, integration testing, load testing, and stress testing. Adept in utilizing automation tools and defect tracking tools to enhance product reliability and performance. Skilled in both **Golang** and **Python**, alongside strong experience in **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** for effective test automation and scripting.

Proficient in implementing SCRUM and Agile practices to deliver high-quality software solutions efficiently. Recognized for collaborating closely with development teams to ensure that applications meet industry compliance standards while optimizing testing processes. Proven ability in employing CLI tools and logging tools to streamline debugging and improve system reliability. Background includes hands-on development in modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, and backend systems with **FastAPI** and **Django**.
